website_summaries.verdict: Whether you need something to combat pregnancy brain or simply want a gentle option that will benefit both you and baby, this natural choline bitartrate supplement is a solid choice.
pros: Provides a full daily dose of choline in a form that's safe to use during pregnancy and breastfeeding
Supports healthy brain development in babies and may boost cognitive function later in life
Free of soy, gluten, fillers, and additives
cons: A bit pricey for a choline bitartrate supplement, but worth the peace of mind it provides expectant and breastfeeding moms

customer_reviews.title: New label
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this brand of choline but last order is different. The old bottle says L (+) choline Bitartrate 550 mg and it says it is made in the USA. New bottle label says just choline Bitartrate 500 mg and it doesn’t mention that it is made in the USA . The powder is more coarse and tan in color compared to old fined white powder. It looks suspicious to me. I am scared of using it. Anyone else noticed the diffeeence?
customer_reviews.author: ayan ahmed

customer_reviews.title: Good choline
customer_reviews.text: Easy to swallow, great packaging... definitely recommend if you’re looking to supplement for choline
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: I'm very happy with this Choline supplement
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this Choline supplement. I added it to my supplement regimen when I was expecting my first child as research showed it to be beneficial for both mothers and their growing babies. If I go without Choline for too long, I really do notice a difference. I'd call it a constant brain fog.... My memory just is not as good either. This particular Choline is a dry form, versus others that are liquid capsules. They've done the job and I certainly intend to purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel N.

customer_reviews.title: Subtle focus/attention Boost
customer_reviews.text: I decided to try the Bitartate formulation, as this was first choline supplement. What I noticed was a calm, and subtle focus increase--likely because of its lower bioavailability, causing it to be smoothly regulated as opposed to my current CDP complex. I actually prefer this supplement over CDP, which ended up giving me issues associated with choline overload. (weakness, headache, irratability, dopamine antagonism, etc.) I found two capsules a day to be the perfect dosage for this product. Nested Naturals Bitartate works extremely well stacked with uridine since cholinergic overload is very unlikely at the reccomended dosage.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Giacoma

customer_reviews.title: Nested Choline 550 mg
customer_reviews.text: Very fast shipping. Taking it 2x a day for fatty liver , memory and clearer thinking. Cant say anything about fatty liver improvement.that will have to wait til my next labwork at next MD checkup in Sept. But I'm confident it will have some positive impact as choline deficiency is known to be most common cause of fatty liver. As far as memory and thinking I definitely can tell some improvement and will continue taking Nested choline 550 mg 2x daily. I find it the best in Quality and price and prompt delivery. Will update review after my next bloodwork. Thank you Nested and Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Ramon

customer_reviews.title: Helps mine and baby's brain!
customer_reviews.text: I'm 9 weeks pregnant now and I'm currently working front desk for one of the most popular and busiest resorts in Orlando. I needed something to help me and baby with our mental capacity. I wanted to remember guests names and documents, and I wanted my little one to have good brain development. I can't go a day without choline. I take it with my prenatals in the morning and I feel like I have my 15 year old sharp memory again. I love love love this stuff. Baby does too. Thank you so much!!
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Better than DHA
customer_reviews.text: I started taking this product when I found out I was pregnant as I read that it was even more important than DHA. It has absolutely helped my memory and energy levels. I also believe that my baby has been hitting milestones significantly sooner than other babies due to vitamins such as this one. I highly recommend it to any woman that is pregnant, breastfeeding or simply wants to improve their memory function.
customer_reviews.author: ali Cali

customer_reviews.title: Being Sharp
customer_reviews.text: As was always very sharp with remembering everything. However, when my wife and I had our first child and have been super busy as time went on I noticed it got more difficult to remember every little thing. This has helped bring back the sharpness I once had before my son.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Corigliano

customer_reviews.title: Magnesium stearate is in the ingredients.
customer_reviews.text: Magnesium stearate is in the (other ingredients), it's important to me to avoid fillers in supplements for purity and best absorbtion. its not listed on the product description or images, Update product information!
customer_reviews.author: Divine

customer_reviews.title: Curb Mommy Brain
customer_reviews.text: I have taken Nested Naturals Choline while pregnant and breast feeding per recommendations I have read. It is suppose to help with nerve development. I feel like it does help curb my "mommy brain." I do notice if I have not taken it, I feel more "cloudy and muddled." I also tell others about it, my sister who is pregnant now is taking it too.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Helps clear the fog
customer_reviews.text: After months of feeling like I'm in a fog, I felt I needed something to help me think clearly again. I haven't been taking Nested Naturals Choline for long, but each day I feel a little more clear and focused. Whether this is is going to solve all my problems is still up in the air, but it seems like a worthwhile investment so far.
customer_reviews.author: Scott G

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product free of main allergens
customer_reviews.text: We get this for my nephew, who really feels and act differently since using Choline. Also we prefer this particular brand, as it contains no wheat, gluten, GMO, soy, dairy, egg, fish, nuts, corn, yeast, barley, sugar, or preservatives. Dealing with some allergies that is important for us too. We will sure continue using this and recommend to anyone who needs it.
customer_reviews.author: A.M.

customer_reviews.title: Magnesium Stearate
customer_reviews.text: Ugh. Although it is not listed on the picture or anywhere else, the bottle has Magnesium Stearate as the last ingredient. So dishonest. Still deciding if I want to return or not, but likely will return.
customer_reviews.author: Shane_FDB

customer_reviews.title: BS
customer_reviews.text: They promised 90 capsules of 500 mg each. But if you look carefully at the instructions, then 500 mg is contained in TWO capsules! I fell for it, and I do not recommend this product because of a fraud
customer_reviews.author: AndreyKG ShmelevKG

customer_reviews.title: Choline Review
customer_reviews.text: As i get older, i feel as though my memory and cognitive function is decreasing. I try to keep my mind working with brain games and certain foods, but it's important to have a supplement as well. What really draws me to this product is that it's GMO-free, food based, and vegan! This makes me feel that i'm bettering myself while being conscious towards my environment at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: not horse pills or smelly
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived on time. Package was easy to open and in pristine condition. The vitamin does not have an overpowering odor and the two pills are easy to swallow capsules. Not too large. It is entirely vegan which I like. The capsules are manufactured in the US of Italian grapeskin, from which apparently choline is derived. I am taking this because I just had my third child and have read choline can help support brain development for nursing babies and also clear the fog of "mommy brain."
customer_reviews.author: devin Aubry

customer_reviews.title: Not the same product. Do not use
customer_reviews.text: I had ordered this product before and loved it. My most recent bottle had been making me feel dizzy and headache and also affected my vision (temporarily). The bottle looks different and it no longer specifies the choline type. I would someone to get in contact with me.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky D.

customer_reviews.title: Taste good, feeling better!
customer_reviews.text: I took this product at the beginning of the day. I recommend eating food with it, although it didn’t specify on the back. It didn’t taste like anything and I felt great during the day. I felt focused and on my game! It’s the bees knees
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: Used this item post partum in conjunction with prenatals, iron, vitamin d and calcium. I was weak a little down and having teeth sensitivity after a couple weeks I feel much better. Because I took a few things I'm not 100% sure if it was choline, the group, or even just time. But I am happy with my purchase. In a few months I'll stop my prenatals and iron supplements and see if I still feel the same. I also read that women who take high amounts of choline are more susceptible to certain types of cancer so do your research.
customer_reviews.author: Heather L.

customer_reviews.title: Battling the post-coffee fog
customer_reviews.text: Since starting my job, I have been fairly addicted to caffeine. Over time though, I have noticed that my coffee withdrawal had gotten worse and worse over time. I would go from anxious and jittery to lethargic and unfocused. I bought choline supplements to help with this issue. After a week, they've since become part of my daily routine! I take one with my morning coffee, and now I feel more focused, capable of thought, and aware at the workplace.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Brain boosting
customer_reviews.text: This week I'm working on a project that requires a lot of focus, and I'm finding choline is really helping me double down on being able to ignore social media and drill in on some heavy designwork. I'm pairing it with caffeine and l-theanine to give me energy, but the choline adds a sharpness that I like. I've taken it before, but not this brand, and this was the first time that I've really noticed the effects.
customer_reviews.author: pinguino kolb

customer_reviews.title: Palpitations
customer_reviews.text: Ever since I got the new formulated product, I now get palpitations about 30 mins to an hour after taking it. I used to always take two at a time but now I have to split it up into two doses in order not to feel those effects. I will not be reordering as I also don’t feel a significant difference in clarity and memory.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Lee

customer_reviews.title: This company makes a great product and I'm happy to have found them
customer_reviews.text: I started taking Choline when I was pregnant in my second trimester and I am still taking it while breastfeeding. My daughter is now 3 and a half months and I believe it not only benefits her but myself as well. I've noticed it helps with brain fog and memory. I am now entering a Master's program and intend to take Choline while in school for my brain health. This company makes a great product and I'm happy to have found them! **I did receive one free bottle in exchange for my honest review.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Frediani

customer_reviews.title: Seems to help with memory during breastfeeding
customer_reviews.text: I'm a breastfeeding mom, and have been using this for about a year. When I ran out for a couple weeks this summer, I did notice a negative difference in my memory and recall...could be coincidental, but I figure it's good for me to take either way. I also used choline (different brand) during the second half of my pregnancy and felt that it was helpful. Update 12/2017 - After some experimenting, I believe this is contributing to my normal/decent short term memory. With out it I feel super forgetful. I'm a fan.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Great energy booster
customer_reviews.text: I honestly don’t know what it actually is but I’ve been using it for a couple of days now. I feel a great energy boost. Take it before work out. Feels good overall that’s a 5 star.
customer_reviews.author: Alina Shialli

customer_reviews.title: First time user!
customer_reviews.text: I never expected Choline to be the one thing that could keep me focused! I have long hours of computer work to do and am easily distracted. This supplement really made me feel zoned into what I needed to accomplish. I even felt less tired getting and more motivated to work out!
customer_reviews.author: Misty Mason

customer_reviews.title: this brand stands out in terms of its quality and excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: Ive been taking choline for a while now, and I've tried multiple brands. For me, this brand stands out in terms of its quality and excellent customer service. I can trust that the product I've received has been held to the highest standards of quality, which goes hand in hand with the overall effects/results of this brand. Speaking of which, my focus, clarity of thought, ability to complete tasks, etc have all increased substantially thanks to using choline, and in my opinion, Nested offers the best in terms of its quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Try and see !
customer_reviews.text: A few weeks after I began enjoying the benefits of choline, I might have to say that it helps tap andaccess to more of my brain now. I think so well, focus better and can remember things I usually forget. I can remember ten digit phone numbers for about a minute after seeing them.I even have noticed more happy moods. I'm not naturally effervescent, but I'm just smiling and singing more and I get more and better sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simple, Natural, Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: I'm all about supplements that support healthy cognitive function, and this one has not disappointed. I really like that there are no strange or unnatural additives -- this product is literally just straight-up choline -- and it's easy to integrate into my normal daily vitamin/supplement regimen. Seems to work well with B vitamins, especially on days when I'm working out.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: I started taking this supplement a few months ago since ...
customer_reviews.text: I started taking this supplement a few months ago since the prenatal I take does not contain Choline. I can tell a difference in my mental alertness and feel I don’t suffer from pregnancy brain as badly as I would without it. It also gives me peace of mind knowing I’m helping with baby’s development as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: easy to swallow
customer_reviews.text: Great that this was fast shipping and package came as delivered and not tampered with. The pill is easy to swallow and doesn't have a taste to it. I've been taking this in the morning but haven't seemed to have too much of an effect so I took it twice a day in morning and afternoon since I work 12 hour shifts. seems to last throughout day!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa N

customer_reviews.title: Goodbye ADHD. Hello Focus
customer_reviews.text: The bottle I purchased was labled L (+) Choline Bitartrate 550 mg. Seriously these pills are phonomenal really helps me to focus & remember I have adult ADHD memory loss and within the first day I seen results I was able to pay attention to the whole sermon at church ! I opened up the capsules so it got to my blood stream quicker & I saw quick progress just like that. The flavor was grosss to me but that’s how I know it’s good for me. Also, for leaving an honest review whether u like them a lot or a little bc u will like it to either degree they bless you with a free bottle too.
customer_reviews.author: Deja P

customer_reviews.title: Metabolism+ !!!
customer_reviews.text: As someone working on increasing their metabolism, choline plays an essential part of it. This non gmo, naturallly sourced capsule helped in regulating the choline level for improved metabolism. Preventing fatty liver is a nice addition but I take these for the metabolism and boost to memory. So far been great!
customer_reviews.author: Abi J

customer_reviews.title: I notice a attitude change almost imminently after using these ...
customer_reviews.text: I notice a attitude change almost imminently after using these. I do get a slight metal taste in my mouth so I don't take often. Seems very potent.
customer_reviews.author: Sherie

customer_reviews.title: it really helped!
customer_reviews.text: I started this supplement on the recommendation of a friend. Not really having expectations on any particular outcome, I was pleasantly surprised to find that it really has helped in mental acuity especially as I started a full time position in my late 50s. I have continued to use this product for a couple years now and plan to continue.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Waller

customer_reviews.title: Improving focus and energy
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I do feel this product has worked as advertised. I recognize many external factors influence focus and energy, but I believe Nested Naturals choline supplement is helping me during the work day to concentrate and control stress levels. I'm going to continue to take this product every morning.
customer_reviews.author: glcast

customer_reviews.title: Important for prenatal
customer_reviews.text: I take one of these daily in addition to my regular prenatal vitamins, as per recommendation by dietician Lily Nichols.
customer_reviews.author: Ashtyn Silva

customer_reviews.title: Nested naturals is my new go-to brand for supplements!!
customer_reviews.text: I use Nested Naturals Supplements Choline for optimal memory, cognitive function and anti-aging properties/protections. Support brain and nervous system performance. It Improves cognitive function, is amazing for strength training, increasing metabolism. Also, choline is a vital component of your neurotransmitters maintaining memory support.
customer_reviews.author: Trenton Q.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love how easy this product is to swallow and has a decent taste to it. I've never ever been a real fan of pills or tablets just because most times you have to swallow them whole or wait until they dissolve which can take a long period of time. This pill is very easy to swallow and I can see the difference in me after taking it for a couple days now. Definitely going to continue using this product.
customer_reviews.author: Leon Townsend

customer_reviews.title: Fatty Liver
customer_reviews.text: 1500 mg per day can reverse fatty liver! Feel great when taking this... not so great when I don't
customer_reviews.author: Robert Noey

customer_reviews.title: Contains Magnesium Stearate
customer_reviews.text: I have not yet used the product. I received it a few days ago and noticed the label does not match what is advertised. On Amazon and Nested Naturals websites, it only shows rice flour and plant cellulose on the "other ingredients." The bottle I received also states Magnesium Stearate. I would not had purchased this if I knew it contained this additional ingredient.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Good but has unnecessary fillers (rice flour)
customer_reviews.text: A pretty good source of this nutrient essential for baby development in the womb, but I'd give 5 stars if they took out the filler (rice flour) and cut the serving size to one pill. Especially since we try to go grain free as much as possible. It would probably cut the cost too (for both manufacturer and consumer).
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Brain food
customer_reviews.text: Brain food for sure. I have been taking these when I have a lot of information to wrangle. Something is working when I take these......
customer_reviews.author: Rufus

customer_reviews.title: Would give it a try
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 85 year old grandmother. Not sure how it’s working for increasing her memory but she seems more focused which is great and allows her to complete tasks more easily.
customer_reviews.author: Estella

customer_reviews.title: Good for your liver
customer_reviews.text: I will keep reordering these - excellent to support your liver & brain health. Quality brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff and used it through my entire pregnancy. I discovered it because it was in my prenatals and I wanted to take a full dose. Supposed to be great for baby. Also it helped relieved my mild anxiety and depression. Really can't go wrong with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jess S

customer_reviews.title: Good value GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I take tgis supplement to promote healing and growth in my brain as well as to complement nootropics. It is a good value, arrives quickly. When taking nootropics, if you don't also supplement with choline you may get a raging headache, which happened to me when using off the shelf alleged choline supplements, but not with this! Nested Naturals always delivers, and I am a loyal customer of these excellent products.
customer_reviews.author: liann peryea

customer_reviews.title: Good supplement
customer_reviews.text: I just read ‘It starts with the egg’ and the author talks about choline being essential so I’m going to be taking it regularly 😊 The capsule is good, no trouble going down, and I like the fact that it’s non GMO and manufactured here in the US😊
customer_reviews.author: Kui Gathumbi

customer_reviews.title: Clean Choline Supplement. Good choice for me!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent supplement, specially for those who need to add chlorine to their diets. I personally do not consume much foods rich in choline such as eggs (due to intolerances), so this is a great way to supplement my diet. I like the fact that it contains no bad fillers and questionable ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Safenprotected

customer_reviews.title: Good for baby, good for Mommy
customer_reviews.text: I started taking this choline when I was pregnant and have continued with it while breastfeeding. During my first pregnancy, I developed an aversion to eggs and haven't been able to stomach them since. So the natural source of choline just isn't happening. This choline is good. I haven't experience adverse reactions and my babies have turned out quite well. Im very pleased and think you'll be too if you try Intranaturals Choline.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Looking forward to seeing this work!  Will update you on 2months
customer_reviews.text: I have big hopes that this will help me with my F.L. problem .Have heard good things about this product and time will tell?? Will up date in 2 months time
customer_reviews.author: John Wik.

customer_reviews.title: Important prenatal supplement
customer_reviews.text: I chose this to supplement my diet during pregnancy due to the increased body of research that is demonstrating the importance of choline in prenatal development. I have been happy with the product thus far. It is easy to take and the company seems to be very socially conscious which I appreciate
customer_reviews.author: Betsy Kirkwood

customer_reviews.title: I find it easy to swallow (not too big
customer_reviews.text: I started taking this brand of Choline when I got pregnant. I find it easy to swallow (not too big, gel like coating on outside) and it's the easiest to swallow out of all of my prenatals. So far I haven't experienced "pregnancy brain." Not sure if it's due to this, but I will most likely continue taking them after my pregnancy for the full beneficial effects.
customer_reviews.author: Tory

customer_reviews.title: Best Choline Bitartrate
customer_reviews.text: My husband was recently diagnosed with Alzheimer’s. I bought this mostly for him but I take it too. I looked at reviews on Amazon and Nested Naturals had the best ones so that’s why I chose this brand and I’m very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy K. Morton

customer_reviews.title: Glad to have found this Choline.
customer_reviews.text: While these capsules are large, they are easy to swallow and digest quickly. Bought to do a liver cleanse. Very happy and will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Grace

customer_reviews.title: Using while pregnant
customer_reviews.text: Taking this during my second and third trimester of pregnancy to support brain development. Capsules have no strong smell or aftertaste.
customer_reviews.author: claire

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried various choline products and find that this one is easy on my stomach and easy to take. I have found others are either upsetting or have a bad odor however have had no issues with this product. I am very pleased with this product. I will definitely continue to purchase
customer_reviews.author: Lauren E

customer_reviews.title: Improved Brain Fog
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for ability to improve clarity and brain fog, have not yet finished a whole bottle and I can notice more clarity with decreased brain fog... also noticed some enhancement of memory recall and retention with a little improvement in mental energy and reduction of mental fatigue, along with better focus, looking forward to greater improvement upon continuing supplementation!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra M

customer_reviews.title: Great so far
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for something to help me with my focus and short term memory and I think I’ve found it. I often have “brain overload “ and have trouble remembering simple things. So far I have noticed my focus has improved.
customer_reviews.author: nr

customer_reviews.title: Best Choline Supplement I've Tried
customer_reviews.text: I took this supplement throughout my entire pregnancy and continue to take it while breast-feeding. The capsules are easy to swallow and do not leave an aftertaste. I will continue to buy this product and will recommend it to others! I received my last bottle of this product for free in exchange for my honest opinion. Update: I am still very happy with this supplement. I am now also taking the prenatal DHA supplement by Nested Naturals. Great company and great products!
customer_reviews.author: BMM

customer_reviews.title: Expiring very soon, other than that, fine
customer_reviews.text: Would've given 5 star review if they weren't expiring in 45 days. Basically, they are 45 days short of their 2 year manufacture date when I received them. I don't like that because they could've been sitting in intense heat in a warehouse for almost 2 years for all I know. Will be switching to something else to try and get fresher product.
customer_reviews.author: Luke Allen

customer_reviews.title: Headaches
customer_reviews.text: I feel this product is pure enough but I am giving it a lower rating because I get HORRIBLE headaches when I take this.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Tasteless
customer_reviews.text: I tend to have problems remembering things sometimes so this was great. I’m not a big fan of pills so I emptied the two capsules into a smoothie and it blended right in. I’ve only had a day so it’s too early to tell if it’s working, but so far I don’t have anything bad to say about it.
customer_reviews.author: Kiana McLeod

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. No complaints except with the size of this mega-pill. It’s a quality product that does have a bit of an “unusual stagnant smell to it” but other than those two obvious qualities IT WORKS.
customer_reviews.author: MomOf6+InTx

customer_reviews.title: I am taking both this and nested vegan DHA (plus ...
customer_reviews.text: I am taking both this and nested vegan DHA (plus other brand supplements) to support a vegan pregnancy. I read about the importance of choline in any pregnancy and looked for it right away-nested's clean, vegan ingredients made it my first choice-already on my third bottle and will continue taking at least several months post-partum.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Cognitive function
customer_reviews.text: Studying for med boards and didn't want any chemicals on my body to keep my brqin sharp so I went natural with the choline caps love it! They are vegan too!
customer_reviews.author: Valeria De Jesus

customer_reviews.title: prenatal choline
customer_reviews.text: I read that choline is very important as a prenatal supplement and a lot of prenatals don't contain enough so I looked all over for a choline supplement that didn't have any unnecessary fillers or ingredients and I'm so glad I came across this product. It had just the right amount of choline for me and my baby and no unwanted chemicals. I will be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: RM

customer_reviews.title: Vegan
customer_reviews.text: This product was recommended to me by a friend who is vegan, but I’m not a vegan so I was like “yeah yeah what’s the big deal” so I tried it out and it definitely does what it says it does. I did my research before purchasing and I’ll be getting a second bottle after this one runs out. You could also get your second bottle at know cost, just follow the directions on the side of the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Quisha

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: Currently 35 weeks pregnant with twins. Since I’ve been taking this, I have less of the brain fog known as “mom brain”. I will continue to take this post pregnancy and when I go back to working overnights. Hoping it will help with the brain fog from working overnight!!
customer_reviews.author: Susie C.

customer_reviews.title: Got this to help to get pregnant
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my hormonal disorders with my period, and also to get more progesterone, and to help to get pregnant. I like it because its vegan. I read that choline was incluided in many womens supplements previous than pregnancy.
customer_reviews.author: Regina C

customer_reviews.title: As close to pure in pill form
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Would prefer it not have magnesium sterate as an additive. I researched many choline bitartrate products and this was the winner after accounting for "other" ingredients (this had the fewest/least "bad") and cost.
customer_reviews.author: Matt in NY

customer_reviews.title: Great for a sharp mind
customer_reviews.text: I have started using this at the recommended dosage to support my memory and cardiovascular and health, and I can safety say I have never felt better in my entire life. No aftertaste or digestive side effects either!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Ross

customer_reviews.title: Good product- helps a lot when studying
customer_reviews.text: Never tried this before and it was a nice supplement to add to my regime. I take it in addition to my fish oil and I get a non-overpowering focus and concentration. I also appreciate the prenatal properties. Good product overall for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Leilani f

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: I tolerated them well and feel like they are helping. I am only taking 1 capsule per day to ensure no skin interactions. I am switching to 2/day today and will report back.
customer_reviews.author: Just started taking it.

customer_reviews.title: Great to add in during pregnancy and breastfeeding
customer_reviews.text: I started taking this supplement because I was pregnant. It is suppose to help boost brain development. Not only for my child but me as well. So, I have been taking it through my entire pregnancy and once I had my baby I chose to continue it for breastfeeding as I figured it would continue to pass on to the baby. Nothing wrong with boosting brain power in the baby and me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: choline for memory
customer_reviews.text: seems like i can recall information quicker. i like the product. try it out for yourself and see if it works
customer_reviews.author: A. Dahl

customer_reviews.title: Great Value, Clean Supplement!
customer_reviews.text: I’m all about natural ingredients! It’s only been two days but you get an awesome value for your money! Definitely excited! Will update in a month or two with how im feeling from it! :)

customer_reviews.text: Great product and the price is very fair pricing . Good information on the label. I am very happy with the product and look forward to trying some of their other offerings.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product at a great price! Have been using this for several months and can tell the difference in my cognitive skills. Will keep using it. Read about how little Choline we get in our diets so, I thought I'd give it a try..it works.

It is also made in the USA at a cGMP facility.

customer_reviews.title: So glad we found nested naturals
customer_reviews.text: I decided to start taking choline when I found out I was pregnant. Choline is incredibly important for developing brains and an added perk is it’s helped me with pregnancy brain! My husband and I were excited to find nested naturals. Not all companies are vegan and natural and we appreciate knowing I’m putting the best vitamins in my body.

customer_reviews.text: Very excited to be able to recommend Nested Natural’s choline to my prenatal clients. I’ve had clients take this for clogged ducts as well postpartum, and I’ve taken it personally for liver work.

customer_reviews.text: Love this supplement so much! Easy to take and doesn’t have any side effects, no bad after taste or anything like that. Helps me have piece of mind that I’m helping my body stay young and have better memory since I felt my memory was already not that great.

customer_reviews.title: I definitely don’t feel any negative side effects since taking their choline and I do think I’ve felt less groggy and more focused at work so I am very pleased of this added bonus

I definitely don’t feel any negative side effects since taking their choline and I do think I’ve felt less groggy and more focused at work so I am very pleased of this added bonus!

I’m excited to see the overall changes after the first week and could potentially see this product being a long term supplement to my vegan diet.

customer_reviews.title: An important nutrient for pregnancy!
customer_reviews.text: As I prepare for a hopeful pregnancy, choline is needed to help prevent birth defects and development of the baby! I have had no problems with this supplement. If you are used to swallowing pills, you should have no difficulty. I also trust that the ingredients are safe.

customer_reviews.title: I was a bit hesitant to take it at first as I easily get an upset stomach with some supplements

I was a bit hesitant to take it at first as I easily get an upset stomach with some supplements, but so far so good! I am nursing now and continue to take this supplement!

customer_reviews.text: Had terrible gallbladder pain and tried this Choline and it has stopped the pain completely. 1 per day is all I need. Will continue this brand.

product_meta.title: Choline Bitartrate 500mg | Promotes Brain Health, Mental Focus & Memory | Prenatal Supplement for Development & Growth | 100% Vegan & Non-GMO Choline
feature_bullets: PROMOTE A HEALTHY BRAIN AND NERVOUS SYSTEM | Choline is a vital component of your neurotransmitters, taking supplemental choline can help promote the health of your nervous system. Choline may also play a role in maintaining memory support and focus.

500MG OF CHOLINE FOR PREGNANT & BREASTFEEDING MOTHERS | Nested Naturals Choline supplement contains 500mg of L+ Choline Bitartrate, vital for pregnant and breastfeeding mothers. Choline supports a well-balanced diet during pregnancy to promote normal prenatal development and growth. Choline can also be taken while breastfeeding to continue supporting your baby’s health.

SUPPORT OVERALL HEALTH | Along with a well-balanced diet, adequate intake of choline helps support and maintain the health of the liver. Choline is also involved in the metabolism of fatty acids, which are an important source of energy for the body and brain.

SOCIALLY CONSCIOUS SUPPLEMENTS | Our Choline is is 100% vegan, non-GMO, gluten-free, soy-free and allergen-free. It is manufactured in our GMP & NSF Certified facility and Third-Party tested for quality assurance.

LOVE CHOLINE, OR YOUR MONEY BACK | Hello, we’re Nested Naturals. We're confident you'll love us, but if you don't, you’re backed by our Lifetime Guarantee. Call or email us for a full refund. There's no hitch!
